item.title: 墨西哥比索跳涨，交易商看淡司法改革
item.description: 墨西哥比索周三在主要货币中涨幅居首，这主要是受到全球因素的提振，以及交易员们对该国司法系统有争议的改革获得批准的看法，该改革对该国资产造成了压力。【原文：The Mexican peso led gains among major currencies Wednesday, boosted by global factors and as traders looked past the approval of a controversial overhaul of the nation’s judicial system that’s weighed on the nation’s assets.】

item.title: 印第安纳一所大学出售乔治亚-奥基夫的画作，为宿舍增光添彩
item.description: 当美国大学从债务市场借贷数十亿美元为校园升级提供资金时，印第安纳州的一所大学却采取了一条独特的途径：出售一幅乔治亚-奥基夫（Georgia O'Keeffe）的画作。【原文：While US colleges are borrowing billions from the debt market to fund campus upgrades, an Indiana university is taking a unique route: selling a Georgia O’Keeffe painting.】

item.title: 根据与 MPT 签订的协议，Steward 将移交医院运营权
item.description: 破产的 Steward Health Care 赢得了与其业主 Medical Properties Trust Inc.【原文：Bankrupt Steward Health Care won initial approval of a settlement with its landlord Medical Properties Trust Inc. that will resolve billions of dollars in lease obligations and hand over more than a dozen hospitals to new managers, averting their potential closing.】

item.title: SBM 为巴西国家石油公司的石油增长提供更多生产船只
item.description: SBM Offshore NV 有两艘大型油轮正驶往巴西，并在等待巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）招标类似设备，以帮助加快在这个拉丁美洲最大产油国的发展。【原文：SBM Offshore NV has two massive oil vessels heading to Brazil and is waiting on Petrobras to offer tenders for similar units to help accelerate growth in what is already Latin America’s biggest producing country.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称客户关系因缺货而 "紧张
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.其产品已成为科技界最热门的商品，该公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示，对有限供应量的争夺令一些客户感到沮丧，并加剧了紧张局势。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang, whose products have become the hottest commodity in the technology world, said that the scramble for a limited amount of supply has frustrated some customers and raised tensions.】

item.title: 侠盗猎车手 6》竞争担忧导致育碧公牛出尔反尔
item.description: 今年将有大量新游戏发布，其中包括 Take-Two Interactive Software 公司期待已久的《侠盗猎车手6》，这使得育碧娱乐公司（Ubisoft Entertainment SA）的一位大牛结束了他们的积极呼吁。【原文：The prospect of a year stacked with new game releases, including Take-Two Interactive Software Inc.’s long-awaited Grand Theft Auto VI, has caused a bull of Ubisoft Entertainment SA to end their positive call.】

item.title: 巴林向贝莱德出售沙特重要石油管道股份
item.description: 巴林向贝莱德公司出售了一条从沙特阿拉伯输送原油的重要石油管道的少数股权，这个海湾地区最小的经济体正寻求将能源资产货币化。【原文：Bahrain has sold a minority stake in a key oil pipeline that transports crude from Saudi Arabia to BlackRock Inc. as the Gulf’s smallest economy looks to monetize energy assets.】

item.title: PG&E 首席执行官表示，电池正在拯救加州电网
item.description: 加利福尼亚州最大的公用事业公司负责人表示，在今年夏天的极端热浪中，加利福尼亚州太阳能发电量巨大的电网之所以能够保持供电，很大程度上是因为电池的快速部署。【原文：California’s solar-heavy electrical grid has been able to keep the lights on this summer during extreme heat waves in large part because of the rapid battery deployment, the head of the state’s biggest utility said.】

item.title: 高歌猛进的垃圾债券市场催热豪华房地产交易
item.description: 高端房地产开发项目正在开发市政债券市场，导致了大量所谓的豪华土豪交易，并为愿意承担风险的投资者带来了丰厚的回报。【原文：High-end real estate developments are tapping the municipal-bond market, leading to a slew of so-called luxury dirt deals and fueling returns for investors willing to take on the risk.】

item.title: 雀巢切断与南非主打咖啡奶精品牌的联系
item.description: 雀巢南非公司正在与一个咖啡奶精品牌断绝关系，在南非，五分之一的速溶咖啡都使用该品牌。【原文：Nestlé SA is cutting ties with a coffee creamer brand that is used in a fifth of all cups of instant coffee drunk in South Africa.】

item.title: 安哥拉宽扎货币对美元汇率跌至25年新低
item.description: 安哥拉宽扎对美元汇率跌至25年来的最低水平，原因是油价疲软和债务偿还限制了这个原油生产国保护本国货币的能力。【原文：Angola’s kwanza fell to its lowest level in 25 years against the dollar as weaker oil prices and debt payments limit the crude producer’s ability to defend its currency.】

item.title: 激进派 Cevian 考虑若战略失效将增持 Baloise 股份
item.description: Cevian Capital AB 公司将仔细研究 Baloise Holding AG 公司即将进行的战略调整，以决定是否通过增持股份和可能任命一名董事会成员来加大对这家瑞士保险公司的压力。【原文：Cevian Capital AB will scrutinize Baloise Holding AG’s upcoming strategy overhaul to decide on whether to ramp up pressure on the Swiss insurer by increasing its stake and potentially install a board member.】

item.title: 电视购物频道 QVC 发行 10 亿美元债务交换债券
item.description: 电视购物频道 QVC Inc. 对其 2027 年和 2028 年到期的票据发起了交换要约，以提前到期日，并利用这些债务在较低水平交易的优势。【原文：Television shopping channel QVC Inc. launched exchange offers for its notes due 2027 and 2028 to push out maturities and take advantage of the debt trading at lower levels.】

item.title: 银行贷款停滞不前，加纳将可可种植农的工资提高 45
item.description: 加纳将把支付给可可种植农户的金额提高 45%，这将有助于可可豆的供应前景，尽管这个世界第二大可可豆生产国尚未获得新一季可可豆的重要资金。【原文：Ghana will raise the amount it pays cocoa farmers by 45%, aiding supply prospects even as the world’s second-largest producer of the beans has yet to secure vital funding for the new season.】

item.title: 普京要求政府考虑限制镍和铀出口
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）要求政府考虑限制镍、钛和铀等商品的出口以报复西方制裁是否合理。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin asked the government to consider if it makes sense to limit exports of some commodities like nickel, titanium and uranium in retaliation for western sanctions.】

item.title: 高盛测试家具销售商 Wayfair 的债务需求
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is holding meetings with leveraged finance investors to gauge their appetite for debt from Wayfair, the online furniture retailer, according to people with knowledge of the plan.】

item.title: 希腊将就国家银行股权出售聘请更多顾问
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，希腊已经安排了更多的投资银行帮助安排希腊国家银行的股份出售，因为希腊政府希望减少其在该国贷款机构中的股份。【原文：Greece has lined up more investment banks to help arrange a share sale in National Bank of Greece, according to people familiar with the matter, as the government looks to reduce its stake in the country’s lenders.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）说，人工智能主题 "煮过头了"。
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）认为，今年早些时候推动 S&P 500 指数创下历史新高的人工智能热潮正在消退，因此股市要想重拾涨势，还需要新的催化剂。【原文：The artificial intelligence boom that powered the S&P 500 Index to record highs earlier this year is fizzling out, so the stock market needs a new catalyst if the rally is going to resume, according to Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson.】

item.title: 孟加拉国向贷款方寻求 50 亿美元紧急资金
item.description: 临时政府领导人穆罕默德-尤努斯说，孟加拉国已向包括国际货币基金组织在内的主要贷款机构寻求 50 亿美元，以重建外汇储备。【原文：Bangladesh has sought $5 billion from major lenders, including the International Monetary Fund, to rebuild foreign exchange reserves, Muhammad Yunus, head of the interim government, said.】

item.title: Stellantis 供应商 CLN 在不景气中寻求债务谈判建议
item.description: 由于需求疲软、通货膨胀和电动汽车销售低迷对该行业造成了影响，Stellantis NV 的一家供应商计划聘请顾问帮助解决超过 4 亿欧元（4.41 亿美元）的债务问题。【原文：A supplier to Stellantis NV plans to hire advisers to help with more than €400 million ($441 million) of debt as softening demand, inflation and sluggish electric vehicle sales impact the sector.】

item.title: 俄罗斯油价回落至七国集团规定的 60 美元价格上限以下
item.description: 俄罗斯的旗舰产品乌拉尔原油已经回落到七国集团及其盟国为惩罚莫斯科的乌克兰战争而规定的每桶 60 美元的价格上限以下。【原文：Russia’s flagship Urals crude has dropped back below the $60-a-barrel price cap imposed by the Group of Seven nations and its allies to punish Moscow for its war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 欧洲 9 月债务高峰创纪录地达到 1,000 亿欧元
item.description: 由于借款人利用较低的收益率和相对平静的市场，在美国总统投票前大举举债，欧洲 9 月份的债券销售额将创纪录地突破 1,000 亿欧元（1,100 亿美元）大关。【原文：Europe is set to pass the €100 billion ($110 billion) mark for September bond sales in record time as borrowers take advantage of lower yields and comparatively calm markets to load up on debt before the US presidential vote.】

item.description: 台湾台新金融控股公司（Taishin Financial Holding Co.【原文：Taiwan’s Taishin Financial Holding Co. has raised its offer for Shin Kong Financial Holding Co. in a move to fend off a competing bid from rival suitor CTBC Financial Holding Co. as the takeover battle for the island’s bank continues.】

item.title: CPI数据公布后，交易员放弃对美联储本月大幅降息的押注
item.description: 在上个月美国消费者通胀核心数据略微升温之后，交易员们巩固了美联储下周仅降息四分之一点的可能性。【原文：Traders cemented odds the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by only a quarter-point next week after US consumer inflation arrived a little hotter on the core reading for last month.】

item.title: 南非银行关注无担保贷款以吸收损失资金
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）表示，南非最大的银行必须在明年开始发行数十亿兰特的新的可吸收损失类债务，这些银行将通过把无担保债务纳入拟议的工具来部分实现这一目标。【原文：South Africa’s biggest banks, who must start issuing billions of rand next year for a new loss-absorbing class of debt, will partly get there by rolling unsecured liabilities into the proposed instrument, Moody’s Ratings said.】

item.title: 美国核心通胀率回升，抑制美联储大规模降息的可能性
item.description: 由于住房成本加速上涨，8 月份美国基本通胀率意外回升，这削弱了美联储下周大幅降息的可能性。【原文：Underlying US inflation unexpectedly picked up in August as housing costs accelerated, undercutting the chances of an outsize Federal Reserve interest-rate cut next week.】
